title: Shinkyoku Soukai Polyphonica (Polyphonica)
synopsis: Phoron Tatara's no ordinary musician. As one of the rare Dantists who can summon elder spirits using music called Commandia, his gift is so strong that his spirit partner is none other than the infamous Corticarte Apa Lagranges. Sure, she may look like a young girl in her human form, but you don't get nicknames like "The Crimson Annihilator" and "The Bloody Duchess" for sitting back and watching the daisies grow.
characters: ['Apa Lagranges, Corticarte', 'Tatara, Phoron', 'Yugiri, Prinesca', 'Yugiri, Perserte', 'Aria', 'Machiya, Matia', 'Lagu Edraikerius, Managariastinockle', 'Akatsuki, Dirrane', 'Mailreit', 'Tsuge, Eufinley']
